testCase.name: protobuf primitives with null and nullable as optional

topics.name: input

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, i INTEGER, l BIGINT, d DOUBLE, b BOOLEAN, s STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='PROTOBUF', value_protobuf_nullable_representation='OPTIONAL');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (value_format='PROTOBUF', value_protobuf_nullable_representation='OPTIONAL') as SELECT * FROM input;
